name: Archer

skills.name: Double Shot
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has an extra 15% chance of inflicting a critical hit. Fills this Champion's Turn Meter by 15% if this attack is critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Rain of Arrows
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies 2 times. Has a 10% chance to place a 15% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 7 Damage +15%
Lvl. 8 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
